com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g2d.physics.joint

Class JointDistance

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g2d.physics.joint.JointBase
      • com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g2d.physics.joint.JointDistance

  • public class JointDistance
extends JointBase
    A distance joint, makes length between bodies constant.
    Author:
    David/Philip Jerzak (RivelBop)

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.rivelbop.rivelworks.g2d.physics.joint.JointBase

        definition, joint

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JointDistance(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body bodyA, com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body bodyB, float length, boolean collideConnected)
      Creates a distance joint by providing just the length instead of the specific coordinates.
      JointDistance(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body bodyA, com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body bodyB, float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2, boolean collideConnected)
      A more customized variant of a distance joint.
      JointDistance(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, PhysicsBody2D bodyA, PhysicsBody2D bodyB, float length, boolean collideConnected)
      Creates a distance joint by providing just the length instead of the specific coordinates, takes in the wrapped physics bodies instead of the LibGDX defaults.
      JointDistance(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world, PhysicsBody2D bodyA, PhysicsBody2D bodyB, float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2, boolean collideConnected)
      A more customized variant of a distance joint, takes in the wrapped physics bodies instead of the LibGDX defaults.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JointDistance

        public JointDistance(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
                     com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body bodyA,
                     com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body bodyB,
                     float x1,
                     float y1,
                     float x2,
                     float y2,
                     boolean collideConnected)
        A more customized variant of a distance joint.
        Parameters:
        world - The world to add the joint to.
        bodyA - The first body to connect.
        bodyB - The second body to connect.
        x1 - The x used for length and positioning on bodyA.
        y1 - The y used for length and positioning on a bodyA.
        x2 - The x used for length and positioning on a bodyB.
        y2 - The y used for length and positioning on a bodyB.
        collideConnected - Enable/disable collisions between the two bodies.

      • JointDistance

        public JointDistance(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
                     com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body bodyA,
                     com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.Body bodyB,
                     float length,
                     boolean collideConnected)
        Creates a distance joint by providing just the length instead of the specific coordinates.
        Parameters:
        world - The world to add the joint to.
        bodyA - The first body to connect.
        bodyB - The second body to connect.
        length - The length of the joint.
        collideConnected - Enable/disable collisions between the two bodies.

      • JointDistance

        public JointDistance(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
                     PhysicsBody2D bodyA,
                     PhysicsBody2D bodyB,
                     float x1,
                     float y1,
                     float x2,
                     float y2,
                     boolean collideConnected)
        A more customized variant of a distance joint, takes in the wrapped physics bodies instead of the LibGDX defaults.
        Parameters:
        world - The world to add the joint to.
        bodyA - The first body to connect.
        bodyB - The second body to connect.
        x1 - The x used for length and positioning on bodyA.
        y1 - The y used for length and positioning on a bodyA.
        x2 - The x used for length and positioning on a bodyB.
        y2 - The y used for length and positioning on a bodyB.
        collideConnected - Enable/disable collisions between the two bodies.

      • JointDistance

        public JointDistance(com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.World world,
                     PhysicsBody2D bodyA,
                     PhysicsBody2D bodyB,
                     float length,
                     boolean collideConnected)
        Creates a distance joint by providing just the length instead of the specific coordinates, takes in the wrapped physics bodies instead of the LibGDX defaults.
        Parameters:
        world - The world to add the joint to.
        bodyA - The first body to connect.
        bodyB - The second body to connect.
        length - The length of the joint.
        collideConnected - Enable/disable collisions between the two bodies.
